00003 #ifndef SCRIPTINGBRIDGE_H_
00004 #define SCRIPTINGBRIDGE_H_
00005 
00006 #include <map>
00007 
00008 #include "core/npapi.h"
00009 #include "core/nphostapi.h"
00010 
00011 namespace crml {
00012   class ScriptingBridge : public NPObject {
00013    public:
00014     typedef bool (ScriptingBridge::*Method)(const NPVariant* args,
00015                                             uint32_t arg_count,
00016                                             NPVariant* result);
00017     typedef bool (ScriptingBridge::*Property)(NPVariant* result);
00018 
00019     explicit ScriptingBridge(NPP npp) : npp_(npp) {}
00020     virtual ~ScriptingBridge();
00021 
00022     // These methods represent the NPObject implementation.  The browser calls
00023     // these methods by calling functions in the |np_class| struct.
00024     void Invalidate();
00025     bool HasMethod(NPIdentifier name);
00026     bool Invoke(NPIdentifier name,
00027                         const NPVariant* args,
00028                         uint32_t arg_count,
00029                         NPVariant* result);
00030     bool InvokeDefault(const NPVariant* args,
00031                                uint32_t arg_count,
00032                                NPVariant* result);
00033     bool HasProperty(NPIdentifier name);
00034     bool GetProperty(NPIdentifier name, NPVariant* result);
00035     bool SetProperty(NPIdentifier name, const NPVariant* value);
00036     bool RemoveProperty(NPIdentifier name);
00037 
00038     static bool InitializeIdentifiers();
00039 
00040     static NPClass np_class;
00041 
00042     // These methods are exposed via the scripting bridge to the browser.
00043     // Each one is mapped to a string id, which is the name of the method that
00044     // the broswer sees.  For example, Paint() has id 'paint', so in the browser
00045     // JavaScript, you would write tumbler.paint() to invoke the Paint() method
00046     // in this object.
00047     //
00048     // Each of these methods wraps a method in the associated Pepper3D object,
00049     // which is where the actual implementation lies.
00050 
00051     // Draws the quarter-circle image representing the stochasitc PI generator.
00052     bool Paint(const NPVariant* args, uint32_t arg_count, NPVariant* result);
00053 
00054    private:
00055     NPP npp_;
00056     NPObject* window_object_;
00057 
00058     static NPIdentifier id_paint;
00059 
00060     static std::map<NPIdentifier, Method>* method_table;
00061     static std::map<NPIdentifier, Property>* property_table;
00062   };
00063 
00064 }       
00065 #endif  /// SCRIPTING_BRIDGE_H_
